main.*:
'''Myron''' is the fiancé of [[Amy Greene]], only mentioned in "[[The One With Rachel's Other Sister]]". 

Myron is the father of Amy's ex-boyfriend Mark and travels a lot. He has a fabulous apartment on Fifth avenue -- Amy appears to like the apartment more than she likes Myron. When [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] tells her she deserves true love, Amy says she will marry Myron while keep looking for Mr. Right.
